abstract: Harold Leppo, former president of Lord & Taylor, dies at age 74.
snippet: While Mr. Leppo was the president of the department store, the company grew from 19 stores in one region to 46 stores nationwide.
lead_paragraph: While Mr. Leppo was the president of the department store, the company grew from 19 stores in one region to 46 stores nationwide.

headline.main: Harold Leppo, a President of Lord & Taylor, Dies at 74
headline.print_headline: Harold Leppo, 74, a President of Lord & Taylor
headline.seo: Harold Leppo, Who Guided Lord & Taylor’s Expansion, Dies at 74
